thread.title: Voices: Kay Lynn Mayhue, on Keeping Clients Calm When Rates May Rise

author: wsjcom
title: Voices: Kay Lynn Mayhue, on Keeping Clients Calm When Rates May Rise
text:
Voices is an occasional column in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. Kay Lynn Mayhue is president of Botsford Financial Group in Frisco, Texas.
With all the talk about the Federal Reserve possibly raising interest rates, our best course of action is to be a calming influence on our clients. Itâ€™s important to prevent clients from making rash decisions in response to a rising-rate environment,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
